code: public void setPath(File path) {     Assert.isTrue(path.exists(), () -> "Path '" + path + "' does not exist").     Assert.isTrue(path.canRead(), () -> "Path '" + path + "' cannot be read").     this.path = path. }
public void setThreshold(DataSize threshold) {     Assert.isTrue(!threshold.isNegative(), "threshold must be greater than or equal to 0").     this.threshold = threshold. }
